creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: nine lines of calligraphy, alternating between long and short lines; signature and seal at L; unmounted
inscription:
Signature, Marks, and Seal

see notes for partial translation
markings: marks, LRQ on back, in pencil: [Baigai] and various at LRC; center L edge, square relief
title: Poetic Quatrain
